DataElement.preferredName: Periodontal Scaling and Root Planing Periodontal Treatment Left Maxilla Performed Year Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the year date of the treatment to the gums, soft tissues, and bones that support the teeth with instrumentation of the crown and root surfaces of a tooth to remove plaque and calculus from these surfaces in the left upper jaw.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Periodontal Scaling and Root Planing Periodontal Treatment Left Maxilla Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to treatment of the gums, soft tissues, and bones that support the teeth with instrumentation of the crown and root surfaces of a tooth to remove plaque and calculus from these surfaces in the left upper jaw.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Periodontal Scaling and Root Planing Periodontal Treatment
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Instrumentation of the crown and root surfaces of a tooth to remove plaque and calculus from these surfaces. It is indicated for patients with periodontal disease and is therapeutic, not prophylactic, in nature. Root planing is the definitive procedure designed for the removal of cementum and dentin that is rough, and/or permeated by calculus or contaminated with toxins or microorganisms. Some soft tissue removal occurs. This procedure may be used as a definitive treatment in stages of periodontal disease and/or as a part of pre-surgical procedures in others.:Treatment of the gums, soft tissues, and bones that support the teeth.

Concepts.definition: Instrumentation of the crown and root surfaces of a tooth to remove plaque and calculus from these surfaces. It is indicated for patients with periodontal disease and is therapeutic, not prophylactic, in nature. Root planing is the definitive procedure designed for the removal of cementum and dentin that is rough, and/or permeated by calculus or contaminated with toxins or microorganisms. Some soft tissue removal occurs. This procedure may be used as a definitive treatment in stages of periodontal disease and/or as a part of pre-surgical procedures in others.
Treatment of the gums, soft tissues, and bones that support the teeth.

Property.preferredDefinition: Left; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.:The upper jawbone in vertebrates: it is fused to the cranium.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The upper jawbone in vertebrates; it is fused to the cranium.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the numeric representation of the calendar year.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
